knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
htmltools::tagList(rmarkdown::html_dependency_font_awesome())
library(glue)
library(yaml)

repo_url <- yaml::read_yaml("_site.yml")[["base_url"]]

make_doc_links <-function(document_name, video_link = TRUE){
  if(video_link){
    glue(
    '<div class="column-right">
**Files**
[<i class="fa fa-file icon-4x"></i>]({repo_url}/blob/master/{document_name}/{document_name})
[<i class="fa fa-github"></i>]({repo_url}/blob/master/{document_name}/{document_name}.Rmd)
[<i class="fa fa-play-circle"></i>](https://vimeopro.com/user39539526/data-analysis-in-r)
</div>
<br>')
  } else{
    glue(
    '<div class="column-right">
**Files**
[<i class="fa fa-file icon-4x"></i>]({repo_url}/blob/master/{document_name}/{document_name})
[<i class="fa fa-github"></i>]({repo_url}/blob/master/{document_name}/{document_name}.Rmd)
</div>
<br>')
  }
  
}
